metadata.name: The Fashion Club #0 - First Collector Pass
metadata.description:
The owner of this pass will be gifted with a Private Membership, which will provide a large number of benefits: from simple perks like airdrops and pre-sales to a subscription for future projects of The Fashion Club in the Metaverse, like exclusive digital garments and more utilities.

The Fashion Club is the NFT project that drives a conversation through Culture and Fashion, between the Real and the Digital society.

This drop is not a collaboration with the artist illustrated. This first step of The Fashion Club is a projection of the history and energy around the worlds of fashion, art, tech & culture.

The set up of a new way of collecting.

Created by J Cabo.

Welcome to the club.
